metadata.name: DNS TOR Proxies
metadata.comment: Identifies IPs performing DNS lookups associated with common Tor proxies.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(query.hostname)) in ('tor2web\.org', 'tor2web\.com', 'torlink\.co', 'onion\.to', 'onion\.ink', 'onion\.cab', 'onion\.nu', 'onion\.link', 'onion\.it', 'onion\.city', 'onion\.direct', 'onion\.top', 'onion\.casa', 'onion\.plus', 'onion\.rip', 'onion\.dog', 'tor2web\.fi', 'tor2web\.blutmagie\.de', 'onion\.sh', 'onion\.lu', 'onion\.pet', 't2w\.pw', 'tor2web\.ae\.org', 'tor2web\.io', 'tor2web\.xyz', 'onion\.lt', 's1\.tor-gateways\.de', 's2\.tor-gateways\.de', 's3\.tor-gateways\.de', 's4\.tor-gateways\.de', 's5\.tor-gateways\.de', 'hiddenservice\.net')))

output.summary: Identifies IPs performing DNS lookups associated with common Tor proxies.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: clientip False positive: Unknown Reference: https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/f99542b94afe0ad2f19a82cc08262e7ac8e1428e/Detections/ASimDNS/imDNS_TorProxies.yaml
